citations.narrative:
The records of animals on hand (name and address of where acquired and number of animals) was not updated for
current animals on hand. A written record of animals on hand is required to be maintained and can be important for
animal tracking and husbandry.
Ensure to maintain animal records up to date for animals on hand as required.
***Correct by July 15, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.

narrative:
2.75(a)(2) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The records of animals on hand (name and address of where acquired and number of animals) was not updated for 
current animals on hand. A written record of animals on hand is required to be maintained and can be important for 
animal tracking and husbandry.  
Ensure to maintain animal records up to date for animals on hand as required. 
***Correct by July 15, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
